title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
statement: Given two sorted arrays of sizes N and M, merge them into a single sorted array without using extra space for the result array. The first N elements should be in the first array and the remaining M elements in the second array, both in sorted order.
input_format:
First line contains two integers N and M.
Second line contains N space-separated integers (first array, sorted).
Third line contains M space-separated integers (second array, sorted).
output_format:
Print two lines:
First line: N space-separated integers of the modified first array.
Second line: M space-separated integers of the modified second array.
